fabianmoronzirfas.me

is (still) under construction

My work at the University of Applied Sciences Potsdam (Germany) keeps me so busy that this here is not a project I can take on right now. You can see the projects of my main seminar "Eingabe/Ausgabe" here and check if the Interface Lab is open here. Take frontal.app for a spin or snoop around in the ExtendScript Wiki. You could take also look into the source files for my next seminar Gestalten in Code or just bundle your ExtendScript with that tool. Maybe you are more into motion graphics? Then these tools might be something for you. If you want to know even more visit one of the social networks below and DM me.
